ch0207_00_lematin/0101_0701_01_10: Thank you for coming to visit today.
ch0207_00_lematin/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ve been looking forward to seeing you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0207_00_lematin/7101_0701_01_10: Do you know about Rotation Battles?
ch0207_00_lematin/7101_0701_02_10:
In this format, both Trainers send out three
Pokémon that rotate positions throughout the
battle.
ch0207_00_lematin/7101_0701_03_10:
If you’re interested, I’d be happy to teach you
more. ♪
ch0207_00_lematin/7105_0701_01_10:
I remember every single person I have ever
battled.
ch0207_00_lematin/7105_0701_02_10:
After all, it would be rude of me to forget
someone if they came back to challenge me again.
ch0207_00_lematin/7105_0701_03_10:
I will never forget you either,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]
ch0207_00_lematin/1701_0701_01_10:
Ah, what splendid timing to see you.
Please, have this.
ch0207_00_lematin/1701_0702_01_10: It’s something small, but I do hope you like it.
ch0207_00_lematin/2501_0701_01_10: Have you met my sisters yet?
ch0207_00_lematin/2501_0701_02_10:
They each have their own quirks, but they’re
skilled at Pokémon battles, and I couldn’t be
prouder of them.
ch0207_00_lematin/2501_0701_03_10:
That being said, their manners as Battle
Chatelaines still need some work...
ch0207_00_lematin/2501_0702_01_10: Hm? They told you that I’m the scary sister?
ch0207_00_lematin/2501_0702_04_10:
It seems I must have a talk with my sisters.
Please excuse me...
ch0207_00_lematin/3001_0701_01_10:
Oh... Heading out this early in the morning, are
you? I expect no less from a promising Trainer! ♪
ch0207_00_lematin/3003_0701_01_10:
If you’re free for a time, please do battle against
me, love! I’ll be looking forward to it.
ch0207_00_lematin/3005_0701_01_10:
Well done for working hard until late. I better call
it a night. I hope you get some rest, too.
